whoami[source]

whoami(name:str='Bernard')

tells you who you are

@param str name: your name

@return nothing

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
whoami()

You must be Bernard.
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
help(whoami)

class GuessWho[source]

GuessWho(name='Bernard')

a guessing interface

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
gw = GuessWho()
gw.guess()

gw_sp = GuessWho("MW")
gw_sp.guess()

You must be Bernard.
You must be MW.
